main.name: Thomas Tutchings
main.bio: My name is Thomas Tutchings and I am a recent IT Bachelor's degree graduate and current UNC Coding Bootcamp Student. Based in Raleigh, NC, I am a hard-working, detail-oriented Software Developer passionate about learning, researching, and writing code and I relish the opportunity to take my programming skills and experience to a company where I can continue to learn and grow as a professional software developer.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to contact me via email, this form, or LinkedIn
